prompts.name: current_weather_new_york_city
prompts.text: What is the current weather in New York City?

prompts.name: current_temperature_new_york_city
prompts.text: What is the current temperature in New York City? Return the temperature in Celsius.

prompts.name: lat_lon_times_square
prompts.text: Can you get me the latitude and longitude for Times Square in New York City?

prompts.name: lat_lon_bluebells_school_delhi
prompts.text: Can you get me the latitude and longitude for Bluebells School in Delhi, India?

prompts.name: iss_current_position
prompts.text: Where is the International Space Station (ISS) right now? Return its latitude and longitude.

prompts.name: usd_eur_exchange_rate
prompts.text: What is the current USD to EUR exchange rate? Return only the rate and source used.
